title: Project Exploring Eigenvector Solutions for Linear Differential Equations

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A curriculum emphasizing intuitive understanding of abstract mathematical concepts through visual data manipulation in simulation environments, designed as part of a science competency enhancement program for working professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can predict eigenvector directions in linear differential equation systems and interpret them geometrically.
Learners can independently derive eigenvector-based interpretation methods through the prediction-investigation-mathematization-generalization process.
Learners can solve second-order linear differential equation systems using eigenvector solutions and apply them to real-world phenomenon modeling.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
